title: More efficient disk sorting logic needed when there are border values for row values
OB:
When sorting data on disk, if there are 40000 rows of data and the program is set to process less than 40000 rows, the current logic performs the following steps:
1. Save the file as a temporary file
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Sort 40000 rows of data on disk
2. Set the program to process less than 40000 rows
3. Observe the following operations performed by the program:
   - Save the file as a temporary file
